title: Press DELETE on Instant Feedback!!!!!!
body:
What in the actual heckers rito!

Just because I'm 9 years old doesnt mean you scare me you idiots!!!!!

Instant feedback system is bad. All I do is troll, feed, afk for the whole game, pay for boosts on my account, use scripts and swear all game at my teammates, whereas the enemy team actually had the audacity to say gg ez in all chat, and then you ban me?!?!??!! WHAT IN THE ACTUAL FUCK YOU DOGSHIT COMPANY I HOPE YOU DIE IN HELL WITH THIS GAME!!!!!!!

WAKE UP PEOPLE WE NEED TO BAN RITO!!!
